    • Method Detail

      • canRemove

        public boolean canRemove(PlayedCardHolder card)
        Tests if the CastleCard of card can be removed without destroying the castle
        Parameters:
        card - PlayedCardHolder that contains the CastleCard which will be temporally erased from the castle
        Returns:
        If the CastleCard cannot be removed, return false otherwise true

      • convertToMatrix

        public int[][] convertToMatrix(Castle castle)
        Converts castle into a 2-dimensional Array
        Parameters:
        castle - Castle that will be converted into a 2-dimensional Array
        Returns:
        Resulting 2-dimensional Array from castle

      • checkPattern

        public boolean checkPattern(Castle castle,
                            CastleForm form)
        Converts castle into a square-matrix (2-dimensional Array) and compares it with form
        Parameters:
        castle - Castle that will be compared to form
        form - Given form that should be fulfilled
        Returns:
        If castle fits into form, return true otherwise false

      • listAvailableBonusCards

        public java.util.List<BonusCard> listAvailableBonusCards(Castle castle)
                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets the current BonusCards from the table and checks whether castle fulfills their conditions or not
        Parameters:
        castle - Castle that maybe fulfills the conditions of given BonusCards
        Returns:
        Returns an ArrayList of the fulfilled BonusCards
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws an Exception, if castle is not completed

      • countCardType

        public int countCardType(Castle castle,
                         CardType cardType)
        Counts the cards of a type determined by cardType in castle
        Parameters:
        castle - Castle contains the counted cards
        cardType - CarType to be counted
        Returns:
        The number of counted cards

      • addToCastle

        public void addToCastle(PlayedCardHolder target,
                        Direction direction,
                        CastleCard newCard,
                        Rotation rotation)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Lays newCrad with a rotation alongside target at a specific direction, if possible
        Parameters:
        target - The target where newCard is to be laid alongside
        direction - The direction where newCard is to be laid alongside (top/right/bottom/left)
        newCard - The CastleCard that will be laid
        rotation - The rotation of newCard (north(east/south/west)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws an Exception, if newCard does not fit

      • isComplete

        public boolean isComplete(Castle castle)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Checks whether castle is completed or not, which means there should be no open connections in castle
        Parameters:
        castle - Caste that maybe completed
        Returns:
        Returns true, if the castle is completed otherwise false
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • fitsInCastle

        public boolean fitsInCastle(Castle castle,
                            CastleCard card,
                            Position pos)
        Tests if card fits in pos of castle, by checking the surrounding connections
        Parameters:
        castle - Castle in which card may fits
        card - CastleCard which may fits in castle
        pos - Specific position in which card may fit
        Returns:
        Returns true, if card fits in pos of castle otherwise false
